alert.note: Alert for Dillon (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 9:08PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Gusty thunderstorm winds will impact portions of northwestern Robeson, north central Dillon and eastern Marlboro Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 908 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Minturn, or 9 miles north of Dillon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Maxton, Rowland, South Of The Border, Raemon, Hamer and Minturn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 197 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
